description:
Yamada takes her mission of seduction to the next level by slipping into a sexy swimsuit and inviting Kosuda to the local waterpark! But when the splashing subsides, a busty, bespectacled rival enters the picture!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Giusto, andiamo in piscina! - Vuoi vedermi in costume, vero? ~ E` comparsa una rivale! - Chi è questa maledetta Coppa F?!
Oh, Yeah! Let`s Go to a Pool! You Wanna See Me in a Swimsuit, Right?! - Here Comes the Rival! Who`s That F-Cup Girl?!
Sou da! Pool ni Ikou Watashi no Mizugi, Mitai yo ne! / Rival Shutsugen Dare yo? Ano F-Cup!?
そうだ! プールに行こう 私の水着, 見たいよねっ! / ライバル出現 誰よ? あのFカップ!?
